name: ComodIT
tag_list: cloud, configuration, provisioning, orchestrate, infrastructure, security, compliance, devops
overview:
ComodIT automates the provisioning and configuration management of physical, virtual and cloud based servers. Delivered as a service, ComodIT enable users to deploy complete infrastructure in one click and within minutes and re-deploy for disaster recover. With ComodIT, one can also keep track of configuration, manage compliance, audit changes, react to alerts through orchestration.

ComodIT is a simple, integrated, and agile solution to deploy and manage your IT infrastructure.

With ComodIT you move up-the-stack, beyond cloud management, and take care of what is going on inside the virtual machine.

ComodIT provides a best of breed DevOps approach together with enterprise features such as identity management, access control, compliance, and auditing.

ComodIT is geared for the cloud, both public and private. Using ComodIT, you’ll be able to centralize your configuration management, track compliance, and orchestrate complex scenarios.

Avoid vendor lock-in: your provisioning will be under control across many public and private cloud platforms (e.g. Amazon, Eucalyptus, Openstack, Rackspace) and on premises technologies (such as KVM, VMware, XEN and bare-metal).
